name: jsfsi-core-typescript
description: Typescript packages to be published to public npm
author: jsfsi

scripts.build:ordered: npm run build --workspace=@jsfsi-core/ts-crossplatform && npm run build --workspace=@jsfsi-core/ts-nodejs && npm run build --workspace=@jsfsi-core/ts-nestjs && npm run build --workspace=@jsfsi-core/template-authenticated-dashboard
scripts.setup: rm -rf node_modules && npm run clean && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.setup:clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm run clean && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
